mmLocalstorage

restrict: 'A'

NameTypeDesciption
mmLocalstorage no parameters
uniqueid string uniqueID to get/set specific part of LocalStorage
value object scope object you want to get/set from LocalStorage 
<div mm-localstorage value="cache" uniqueid="ProductsView"></div>
in Controller 
 $scope.cache={}
You can use it in html or in Controller 
<div class="btn-toolbar" style="margin-top: 5px">
  <div class="btn-group">
    <a class="btn btn-default" data-ng-click="cache.viewMode='table'" data-ng-class="{active: cache.viewMode == 'table'}"><i class="fa fa-table"></i></a>
    <a class="btn btn-default" data-ng-click="cache.viewMode='gridLarge'" data-ng-class="{active: cache.viewMode == 'gridLarge'}"><i class="fa fa-th-large"></i></a>
    <a class="btn btn-default" data-ng-click="cache.viewMode='grid'" data-ng-class="{active: cache.viewMode == 'grid'}"><i class="fa fa-th"></i></a>
  </div>
</div>
